title: Cyclist Junior: free with the next issue of Cyclist
content:
Cyclist magazine
24 May 2021

From the makers of Cyclist magazine, Cyclist Junior is a guide to getting kids riding. Subscribe by 31st May to get yours

Lockdown has seen a surge of interest in cycling, which shows no signs of abating as people of all ages take to two wheels for fun, exercise and freedom.

From the makers of Cyclist magazine, Cyclist Junior is a guide to getting kids riding, with advice on how to choose a bike, how to teach kids to ride, how to keep them safe and how to have the perfect family day out on bikes.

It also has some of the coolest bikes and kit for kids of every age, with brands such as Frog, Isla, Specialized, Forme, Cube and many more. Whether your young'un is just taking their first wobbles on a balance bike, heading off exploring on two wheels or looking to start racing on the road, Cyclist Junior has the bikes they'll want to ride (and that will make you a bit jealous).

It's free with the next issue of Cyclist, so don't miss out on your chance to subscribe to issue 115 of Cyclist to ensure you receive the Cyclist Junior supplement: head to cyclistmag.co.uk/subscriptions/cyclist-junior and subscribe by 31st May.
